description: Not much is known about him or his past. He`s a former member of Magic Council, ranked on the sixth seat and a close friend of Makarov, master of Fairy Tail Guild. He always tries to help get out of from difficult situations as the circumstances of the war between Fairy Tail and Phantom Lord. He was also opposed to firing Atherion. Currently he is owner a restaurant with magic food, called "8 island". Apparently, he and Makarov are old friends or schoolmates.
name: Shitou Yajima
